description: Hayato, with his black belt in judo, would be the first to warn you not underestimate him just because of his size. After the attack on Side 7, the pint-sized Hayato joins the White Base crew and volunteers for pilot training, largely out of a sense of rivalry with his former neighbor Amuro. Though his fighting skills can`t compare to Amuro`s, Hayato is loyal, fearless, and determined.
name: Hayato Kobayashi
